Description: Peavey EVH Wolfgang Up for auction! Peavey EVH Wolfgang Electric Guitar with Roadrunner Soft Case. Mid-Era EVH with 91****** serial number, Patent 386.117 plus Van Halen signature on back of head-stock.. 100% Functional. But shows player wear. Body except the binding shows a repaint attempt on front and backside. Neck is has original paint. Neck is straight. Pot cover is missing 2 screws. Tremolo cover is missing altogether. Strings are old. Frets are about 60%. Features: 3 way switch, 2 Volume knobs, EVH Pickups, Made in Germany machine heads, Floyd Rose. Unknown history or mods except what has been observed.
